Reviews.Title: “DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS DUMP!”
Reviews.Author: Christina1202
Reviews.Content: ive stayed share hotels hostels throughout europe atlanta worst hotel ive stayed staff didnt try feel welcome spoke little english didnt time suggestions didnt arrival checked questioned hotel dirty smelly stayed 1 bed boyfriend woke bug bites sleeping bed checking american guest yelling front desk bugs bathroom couldnt shower front desk wouldnt change couldnt walk bed hitting window water shower actually stopped midway ice hot shower positive hotel 2 minute walk pigalle metro stop highly recommend booking elsewhere avoid terrible recommend hostel atlanta

Reviews.Content: located pigalle red light district hotel 50m pigalle metro stop hotel red light worries heavy tourist packed locals staff spoke english friendly helpful contintental breakfast rolls jam juice wifi avail fee comfy clean view courtyard value location shops cafes metro stop steps

Reviews.Content: couple stayed oct 2011 location didnt feel threatened red light district wasnt seedy 10 steps pigalle metro station paris 20 mins hotel average stupidly expectations clean friendly ish couple perfect stay didnt noisy werent able sleep reviews spot

Reviews.Title: “Booked 5,Stayed ONE !”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel 5 nights left hotel morning staff friendly lady speaks couple languages communicating hotel cheap 65 euros 100 cheap parisian standard trouble started single windows buildingi pay 2euros safe box nightwhich didnt offcourse wiped bill walls thin people noise door hotels fault couldnt sleepbut worst location red light guys try pull creepy night clubs heard ripped huge bill gangs street beating wasnt comfortable didnt feel safe ran morningbut ok dangerous neighbourhoods transportation convinient theres metro station 100 yards hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for your trip to Paris”
Reviews.Author: Pictureseer
Reviews.Content: hotel set pigalle transport links 25 yards wouldnt metro bus taxis readily available short walk takes moulin rouge direction basilica coeur staff hotel friendliness personified speak little french managed day staff spoke english evening staff spoke little english little french buses run louvre notre dame little road train coeur metro restaurants menus french english staff speak little english handy price value money wife recommend hotel strongly
